UseVegvisir: Use vegvisir for the first time
StarterKit: Create a hammer, a stone axe, a club and a torch
Sleep: Skip the night by falling asleep on the bed
Campfire: Have a rest near the campfire
CookCoal: Turn a piece of meat into coal
CollectMushrooms: Pick up 200 mushrooms from the ground
CollectStones: Pick up 200 stones from the ground
CutTrees: Cut down 500 trees with an axe
KillDeerBow: Kill a deer using a bow
KillDeerNoBow: Kill a deer without a bow
KillBird: Kill a gull or a crow using a bow
DefeatEikthyrArmy: Survive the attack of the Eikthyr army
VikingGraveyard: Plunder a viking graveyard in the meadows
CollectTrophies: Collect all the trophies available in the meadows
